data.title: Search for a person
data.text:
This criterion is most effective when you know exactly the person you are looking for. If you are not sure, or want to find a group of people, some of the other criteria may be more useful.

People are listed alphabetically by surname, with first names and dates of birth and death (or a fl. date of known activity) to help distinguish between people of the same name.

This criterion will find all people of the same surname or pseudonym.

Choose an item from the drop-down list. If you don’t want to apply this criterion, leave the box showing ‘any surname’.

This criterion is most useful for finding a group of related people, or for narrowing down a search where you don’t know the precise identity of the person you’re looking for.

The list shows all the surnames recorded in Lucerna, listed alphabetically.

This criterion will find all people whose name contains a given group of characters.

Type the text you want to find into the box. If you don’t want to apply this criterion, leave the box empty.

This search is most useful to find a group of people with similar names, or if you are not sure of a person’s full name or the spelling of their name.

This criterion will find people recorded as having been associated with a given organisation.

Choose an item from the drop-down list. If you don’t want to apply this criterion, leave the box showing ‘any organisation’.

This criterion is most useful for finding a group of people, or for narrowing down a search where you don’t know the precise identity of the person you’re looking for.

The list shows all the organisations recorded in Lucerna for which there are also records of related people, listed alphabetically by the name of the organisation.
